name: English Plus Reader - 1*
description:

Th e series employs a variety of tools and techniques to help learners develop effective  ommunication skills, literary, creative and cognitive capacities, and expanded cultural awareness.
Th e series has a multi-skill approach to English language learning with all the elements of language such as listening, speaking, reading, writing, vocabulary, structure and grammar integrated so as to facilitate the larger goal of language acquisition.
